channel.title: 2 problems
channel.description:
whenever im trying to do ice barrage i get this error in my runserver and it dcs me (this is on other players) [code][client-4-saintapollo]: npcIndex: 3086 magicID: 60 java.lang.NullPointerException at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:19278) at client.packetProcess(client.java:16299) at client.packetSending(client.java:16268) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:152) at server.main(server.java:49)[/code]
and every so often my server all of a sudden crashes sends me this error and tells me every body is online
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.SpecDamg(client.java:650) at client.process(client.java:15260) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:151) at server.main(server.java:49)[/code]
any ideas on how to fix either of them?
